document_data.name: Phibs Brogan
document_data.mainbody:
'''Phibs Brogan''' was a foppish patron of the [[Elfsong Tavern]] from the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|What in the hells are you staring at? Have I got [[spinach]] in my teeth?|Phibs Brogan}}
document_data.Description:
Phibs was a fashionably dressed [[gold dwarven]] man. He had a dusky skin tone, dark brown eyes, and black hair. He kept his head clean-shaven and gathered the trimmed beared into a tied knot.

Notably, Phibs wore a red suit he purchased from [[Carm's Garm]], a clothier located on the [[Wyrm's Crossing]]. Unfortunately, that outfit made him look a lot like [[Dolor]], a [[Bhaalist]] serial killer dwarf.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Phibs Brogan was a frequent customer of the Elfsong Tavern in the [[Baldur's Gate/Eastway|Eastway]] neighborhood of Baldur's Gate. He attended the "Laff Riot" show at the Elfong, a stand-up comedy performance hosted by [[Harvard Willoughby]] in Elfsong's side room with a stage. Phibs was excited to see the show after his friend, [[Roanoke]] "almost pissed himself laughing." Phibs' expectations were high as Harvard Willoughby wore a [[monocle]] and anyone wearing one was good in the dwarf's book.
